name: RR HD Remix!
description:
Pirates are after your treasure and all you got is a rocket launcher! Can you defend against this relentless assault of pirate boats!

How To Play:

Aim with your mouse and left-click to fire!

Features:

- 6 Levels with increasing difficulty

- Boss fight

- Upgrade system after completing each level

Extra Details:

- Models were downloaded from various free sources (including here on itch.io!)

- Made with UE4

- Prototype made to see the limitations of UE4 HTML5 projects.
